Step.Text: First, open the Videxio Meeting Room in your web browser, then select the gear icon.
Change the Camera, Microphone, and Speakers to the correct devices.
Set Camera to Logitech C930, and Speakers to NEC E670.
First, open the Skype for Business application, then select the preferences from the application menu.
Change the Camera, Microphone, and Speakers to the correct devices.
Set Camera to Logitech C930, and Speakers to NEC E670.
First, open the Cisco WebEx Meeting in your web browser. You will be prompted for your audio/video method to join the meeting.
For "Select Audio Connection", choose "Call Using Computer".
For "Select Video Connection" choose the Camera. Set Camera to Logitech C930.
First, open the Video Meeting Room in your web browser, then look for the settings menu. Note: It may not look like this image.
Within the settings menu, change the Camera, Microphone, and Speakers to the correct devices.
Set Camera to Logitech C930, and Speakers to NEC E670.
